        public boolean insertEmployeeLog(LoginTable l)

        Returns:
        returns a boolean value: true or false

      • getEmployee

        public java.lang.String getEmployee(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        getEmployee method is used to get the type of employee logging in, it will be either admin or employee
        Parameters:
        username - Name of the user logging in
        password - Password for the user
        Returns:
        returns type of employee as string, else returns invalid string
